Name: Forgejo
Author: eggs@goover.dev
InstallScript:
#!/bin/bash
# Forgejo Installscript
# (c)2023 by gOOvER - https://goover.dev
#

RED='\033[0;31m'
GREEN='\033[0;32m'
YELLOW='\033[1;33m'
BLUE='\033[0;34m'
NC='\033[0m'

echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------${NC}"
echo -e "${YELLOW}Forgejo Installscript${NC}"
echo -e "${YELLOW}Template by gOOvER - https://discord.goover.dev${NC}"
echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------${NC}"

echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------${NC}"
echo -e "${YELLOW}updating system...${NC}"
echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------${NC}"


## Variables
ARCH=$([[ "$(uname -m)" == "x86_64" ]] && echo "amd64" || echo "arm64")
LATEST=$(curl -sSL https://codeberg.org/api/v1/repos/forgejo/forgejo/releases/latest | jq -r ".tag_name" | sed -e 's|^v||')

echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------${NC}"
echo -e "${YELLOW}Latest Forgejo Version: ${GREEN} ${LATEST} ${NC}"
echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------${NC}"

cd /mnt/server

echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------${NC}"
echo -e "${YELLOW}Download url: https://codeberg.org/forgejo/forgejo/releases/download/v${LATEST}/forgejo-${LATEST}-linux-${ARCH} ${NC}"
echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------${NC}"

rm -f forgejo

if [ -z "${VERSION}" ] || [ "${VERSION}" == "latest" ]; then
    echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------${NC}"
    echo -e "${YELLOW}downloading Forgejo $LATEST ${NC}"
    echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------${NC}"
    curl -sSL -o forgejo https://codeberg.org/forgejo/forgejo/releases/download/v${LATEST}/forgejo-${LATEST}-linux-${ARCH}
else
    curl -sSL -o forgejo https://codeberg.org/forgejo/forgejo/releases/download/v$VERSION/forgejo-$VERSION-linux-${ARCH}
    echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------${NC}"
    echo -e "${YELLOW}downloading Forgejo $VERSION ${NC}"
    echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------${NC}"
fi

chmod +x forgejo

mkdir -p custom

if [ -f "/mnt/server/custom/app.ini" ]; then
    echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------${NC}"
    echo -e "${YELLOW}config file exists${NC}"
    echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------${NC}"

else
    echo "[server]
    LOCAL_ROOT_URL = http://${SERVER_IP}:${SERVER_PORT}/
    DOMAIN           = ${SERVER_IP}
    HTTP_PORT        = ${SERVER_PORT}
    ROOT_URL         = http://${SERVER_IP}:${SERVER_PORT}/
    DISABLE_SSH      = ${DISABLE_SSH}
    SSH_PORT         = ${SSH_PORT}" > /mnt/server/custom/app.ini
fi

## install end
echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------${NC}"
echo -e "${GREEN}Installation completed...${NC}"
echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------${NC}"
